sentences.sContent: The prevision , dissolving to the risk is the first quality that an entrepreneur should possess .
sentences.sContent_eng: The prevision , dissolving to the risk is the first quality that an entrepreneur should possess .
sentences.sCn: 对于风险的预知、化解是企业家所应具备的第一素质。

sentences.sContent: The paper puts forward the online container shipment problem with limited prevision information, in which an online algorithm gets to know several requests in future when each request arrives.
sentences.sContent_eng: The paper puts forward the online container shipment problem with limited prevision information, in which an online algorithm gets to know several requests in future when each request arrives.
sentences.sCn: 提出了有限预知信息的集装箱搬卸占线问题，即每一个服务请求到达时预先知道后续一部分请求信息的占线问题。

remMethod.val: pre(预先) + vis(看) + ion → 预先看到的 → 先见

trans.tranOther: the act or power of foreseeing; prescience
